channel.title: Project Apower Devo2.7
channel.description:
Well quitting RSPS or even java at all..... Server is not really good, never fixed pvp bugs since i just was programing for fun.... bit poor coded etc.
For sure learned a lot by playing around with this. Maybe will make something serious later some time.
Server got an easy anti-leech in server.java for luls.
and client got a annoying anti-leech.. but easy to fix just takes some time. Client is based on Galkon ref.
[B]Features:[/B] *Prayer icons *Some custom interfaces *Few random stuff *Fixed and other things added(easier dialouges) etc.) *Simple NPC clip system, added Moss giant area(more areas is in my configure thread) *Sounds on many weapons, on dropping and picking items, ice blitz and barrage + teleports. *New DH axe and whip look, some emotes as veng and dclaw(not added in server) *More random...
[B]Forgot to fix a bug on new players, they get a protect from melee headicon first time they login.... fix yourself not hard[/B]
Pictures:
[IMG]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/7323/rangemoss.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/6094/spell.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/1228/randomfb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/1836/clanchatinterface.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4343/ashop.jpg[/img]
Download: Server:[URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?vd2kn5zkmgm"]http://www.mediafire.com/?vd2kn5zkmgm[/URL] Client: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?wmzi3gnmmye"]http://www.mediafire.com/?wmzi3gnmmye[/URL]
Client SoundPlayer class: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?zxydjmdjmzf"]http://www.mediafire.com/?zxydjmdjmzf[/URL]
i do not give permission to do anti-leech and upload again, it easy to fix but everyone who wants this HAVE to do it on their own. And i don't want this server or client on any other site than RS or moparscape.
Credits: Knova Apower Killamess 2pac Galkon SWAT And for sure some more.
I quitting RSPS and Java since i got too much to do in real, school taking up 70% of my time and i sleep 20% of it and i got Sports 50%.....Makes absolute no time for stuff like this.... Thanks for good times google!
This is only relased on RS and now Moparscape

item.title: Project Apower Devo2.7
item.dc:creator: @Apower Apower
item.description:
@Apower wrote:

Well quitting RSPS or even java at all… Server is not really good, never fixed pvp bugs since i just was programing for fun… bit poor coded etc.

For sure learned a lot by playing around with this. Maybe will make something serious later some time.

Server got an easy anti-leech in server.java for luls.

and client got a annoying anti-leech… but easy to fix just takes some time.
Client is based on Galkon ref.

Features:
*Prayer icons
*Some custom interfaces
*Few random stuff
*Fixed and other things added(easier dialouges) etc.)
*Simple NPC clip system, added Moss giant area(more areas is in my configure thread)
*Sounds on many weapons, on dropping and picking items, ice blitz and barrage + teleports.
*New DH axe and whip look, some emotes as veng and dclaw(not added in server)
*More random…

Forgot to fix a bug on new players, they get a protect from melee headicon first time they login… fix yourself not hard

Pictures:





Download:
Server:http://www.mediafire.com/?vd2kn5zkmgm
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?wmzi3gnmmye

Client SoundPlayer class: http://www.mediafire.com/?zxydjmdjmzf

i do not give permission to do anti-leech and upload again, it easy to fix but everyone who wants this HAVE to do it on their own.
And i don’t want this server or client on any other site than RS or moparscape.

Credits:
Knova
Apower
Killamess
2pac
Galkon
SWAT
And for sure some more.

I quitting RSPS and Java since i got too much to do in real, school taking up 70% of my time and i sleep 20% of it and i got Sports 50%…Makes absolute no time for stuff like this… Thanks for good times google!

This is only relased on RS and now Moparscape
